name: Keybinder (Proper)
description:
Keybinder is a puzzle platformer where your controls and keybindings are constantly being changed to find new ways to traverse the level.  There are eight distinct actions to perform, but their blocks must be placed on a power socket before you can use their action.  To complicate matters further, each power socket has its own keybinding, meaning that the button for each action will change depending on which power socket is being used.  It will take both wit and determination to make it through all 15 levels, so best of luck!

Controls:

W/A/S/D and I/J/K/L: Various actions (determined by placement of action blocks on power sockets)

R - Restart level

Tab - View Actions/Controls

Esc - Return to Menu

Music Credits:

“Awake!” by cynicmusic (http://cynicmusic.com http://pixelsphere.org)

“Tower Defense Theme” by DST (http://www.nosoapradio.us)

“Cyberpunk Moonlight Sonata” by Joth

“Raining Bits” by Gundatsch (https://soundcloud.com/gundatsch)

“Future Travel” by Zodik
